articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-Reunification Action Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-Reunification Action Blasted
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet conservative group took the anti-reunification action of disallowing the participation of the south side delegation in the joint national event to be held by delegates of various circles in the north, the south and overseas in Kaesong on the occasion of the 11th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in a statement on Wednesday  bitterly denounced this action as another blatant challenge to the north-south joint declaration and an unpardonable criminal act of  chilling the desire of the compatriots for peace and reunification.
					
					 By blocking even the joint national event this year, the Lee Myung Bak group brought to light its sinister intention to persistently rush headlong into confrontation and war, denying the joint declaration, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 National reunification is the greatest desire of the nation and nothing is more urgent than peace on this land.
					
					 The south Korean people and all other compatriots' resentment at the puppet group going against peace and reunification has reached its height.
					
					 All the Koreans will never pardon the above-said criminal acts of brutally suppressing the movement for reunification in violation of the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The said committee will join the south Koreans and all compatriots overseas in stepping up the nation-wide march for reunification under the uplifted banner of the said declaration no matter what desperate efforts the group of traitors make.

articles.title: Appeal Issued to Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Appeal Issued to Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The North, South and Overseas Side Committees for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration should firmly join hands in the spirit of June 15 and dynamically open a new phase of national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification.
					 They declared this in a joint appeal on June 15, the 11th anniversary of the publication of the joint declaration.
					
					 The adoption of the joint declaration in June 2000 was a great event which replaced the history of national division recorded with distrust and confrontation by a new history of reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification, the appeal said, and went on:
					
					 The way of visits, contacts, dialogue and meeting for reunification remains blocked between the north and the south at present and only the atmosphere of confrontation and war is prevailing between them.
					
					This is obviously attributable to the denial of the joint declaration and the stir up of the confrontation between compatriots.
					
					 Moreover, the action taken finally to disallow the event common to the nation marking the 11th anniversary of the joint declaration in Kaesong which NGOs in the north, south and abroad agreed upon and pushed forward is an open negation of the national concord, peace and reunification.
					
					 Such act for perpetuating the national division aimed at scuttling the national unity, cooperation and exchange and seeking to escalate the confrontation will be clearly recorded in history and will certainly be punished.
					
					 Let all the fellow countrymen get united for implementing the joint declaration.
					
					 This is a promise and determination made by All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration before the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The implementation of the joint declaration is the only way of overcoming the present reality in which the situation is inching close to an armed conflict. 
					
					 The said committee will take the lead in promoting the national reconciliation and unity and achieving peace and independent reunification.
					
					 A stumbling block is lying in the way of implementing the joint declaration but it is temporary and no force on earth can stem the violent trend of the June 15 era,  stressed the appeal.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets Italians
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets Italians
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Wednesday met and had a talk with Alfonso Galdi, director of the International Department of the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy, and his companion who paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Italian Party
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Italian Party
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy.
					 Alfonso Galdi, director of the International Department of the Party on a visit to the DPRK, handed over the gift to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Swiss Delegation
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Swiss Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Wednesday met and had a talk with a delegation of the Swiss Foreign Ministry led by Beat Nobs, deputy secretary of State who paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Meetings of Working People's Organizations Held
articles.content:
Meetings of Working People's Organizations Held
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Meetings of youth and students and agricultural workers were separately held on Wednesday to celebrate the 47th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Reporters and speakers said at the meetings that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the WPK on June 19, Juche 53 (1964), provided a firm guarantee for the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche and opened up a bright future for the country and the nation.
					
					 They referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK to be a powerful political organization guiding the revolutionary cause of Juche by preserving and glorifying President Kim Il Sung's idea of party building and exploits performed in it.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK could consolidate the unity and cohesion centered on the leader as firm as a rock and remarkably strengthen the driving force for the revolution and the DPRK came to demonstrate its might as a political and military power, they said.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has brought about a dramatic change in the revolution and construction by giving play to the mental power of the popular masses, they noted, adding that he lit a torch of a new revolutionary great surge and has energetically led the Korean people in their efforts to build an economic power through his endless field guidance.
					
					 Present at the meetings were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, officials concerned, youth and students and agricultural workers.

articles.title: School Youth and Children Visit Birthplace of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
School Youth and Children Visit Birthplace of Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The members of the group of school youth and children from across the country for the study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu Wednesday visited Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Secret Camp in Mt. Paektu on the occasion of the 55th   anniversary of his exploration of the course of study tour of the sites. 
					 They laid floral baskets and bunches of flowers before the mosaic depicting the peerlessly great persons erected in the secret camp and held a meeting for adopting a letter to Kim Jong Il.
					
					  At the end of the meeting, they looked round historic relics preserved at the birthplace with care.

articles.title: Officials Enjoy Performance Given by Art Groups of Families of Servicepersons
articles.content:
Officials Enjoy Performance Given by Art Groups of Families of Servicepersons
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A performance given by the art groups of families of servicepersons of the Korean People's Army which participated in the second term-fourth contest of art groups of families of servicepersons of the KPA took place at the Mansudae Art Theater on Wednesday.
					 Among the audience were senior party and state officials and officials of armed forces, power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Its repertoire included colorful numbers of diverse genres like oungum ensemble "Nostalgia", an immortal masterpiece, accordion and song "Glory to Our Great Party".
					
					 Through their performance the performers successfully represented the faith and will of the families of servicepersons to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution and dedicate themselves to the struggle for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Solo "I Am a Wife of Officer", chorus and story-telling "We Will Bring into Bloom Soldiers' Life" and other numbers were acclaimed by the audience for making a profound depiction of the life of the families of servicepersons in the Songun era.

articles.title: Papers Editorially Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Papers Editorially Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration 
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Papers Wednesday dedicate editorials to the 11th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					The north-south summit meeting, the first of its kind in the history of national split, took place and the June 15 joint declaration, a programme for reunification common to the nation, was adopted 11 years ago, Rodong Sinmun notes, and goes on:
					
					 The adoption of the June 15 joint declaration and the dynamic advance of the era of independent reunification are the brilliant fruition of Kim Jong Il's outstanding and tested leadership.
					
					 His grandiose plan and energetic leadership brought about a new event in which another north-south summit meeting took place in October 2007 and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the historic June 15 joint declaration, was adopted. 
					
					However, the Korean people's struggle to achieve the country's reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are facing serious difficulties at present.
					
					 The present south Korean ruling forces are getting frantic with the moves to escalate the confrontation in collusion with outside forces, while malignantly decrying the said declarations.
					
					 It is the urgent militant task of our nation at present to put an end to the south Korean conservative authorities' moves to escalate the confrontation.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should get united and launch a dynamic nation-wide general offensive to punish the Lee Myung Bak group for hamstringing the implementation of the said declarations and escalating the confrontation with compatriots. 
					
					 The independent reunification, peace and prosperity are sure to be achieved as they are guided by the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il and powerful strength of the nation closely united under the banner of the said declarations.
					
					 Minju Joson declares that all the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad will wage a vigorous nation-wide struggle under the banner of "By our nation itself" under the leadership of Kim Jong Il and thus successfully and proudly carry forward the historic cause of June 15 declaration.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The June 15 joint declaration has served as an inspiring banner dynamically arousing all Koreans to a sacred patriotic struggle for reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a by-lined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The north-south joint declaration has fully demonstrated its vitality for its truth and validity.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are the declarations based on the spirit of "By our nation itself" reflecting the desire of the fellow countrymen and the need of the times. For this reason, as soon as the June 15 joint declaration was published with the idea of "By our nation itself" as its core, it was unequivocally supported and hailed by all the compatriots in the north and the south and overseas.
					
					 Astonishing successes hardly imaginable in the past were achieved in the development of the relations between the north and the south and in the national reunification movement.
					
					 But the appearance of the Lee Myung Bak regime pursuing the confrontation between the north and the south in south Korea threw a stumbling block in the way of implementing the two declarations.
					
					 The conservative group groundlessly defiled the said declarations, which the north and the south had agreed upon and commanded the unanimous support and welcome of all Koreans and the whole world, and slandered the spirit of "By our nation itself", the idea common to the nation as "chauvinistic nationalism".
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have reached such worst phase that they can no longer be repaired and the constant danger of a nuclear war is hanging over the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The reality underscores the need for all the fellow countrymen at home and abroad to make a clean sweep of the Lee Myung Bak group, a gang of anti-reunification traitors, to achieve independent reunification and peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean Defense Minister's Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean Defense Minister's Remarks
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's major newspaper Rodong Sinmun in a signed commentary today censured Kim Kwan Jin, puppet minister of Defense of south Korea, for his belligerent remarks over the statement of a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army.
					 At a recent "Asian security meeting" in Singapore Kim said that the statement is as good as a "military adventure" and gives "negative aspect on peace and stability." He went the lengths of remarking that efforts should be reinforced to deter possible provocation and that they would not tolerate it.
					
					 His remarks revealed the criminal attempt of south Korea to shift the blame for the acute tension of the Korean Peninsula on to the DPRK and intensify the confrontation with it, the commentary said.
					
					 This is no more than a dying cry of the hideous criminal bound to face punishment by the nation, it said, adding:
					
					 Kim has taken the lead in the confrontation with fellow countrymen while holding such important posts of the puppet military as the chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff.
					
					 It was he who unhesitatingly let loose the adventurous war blast that they would carry out aerial bombing in case of "provocation" by somebody, such violent words his predecessors dared not utter. He even defiled the dignity of the DPRK's leadership, claiming that "it is evidently the principal enemy."
					
					 The political and military provocation by the puppet forces of south Korea has reached the worst phase since its military was placed under the control of such peerless war maniac.
					
					 Traitor Kim Kwan Jin's recent remarks about "peace" and "stability" are just sophism aimed to cover up his true colors as a war hawk.
					
					 This reckless deed only stresses the need to punish him in the joint name of the nation as soon as possible.
					
					 The day is not far off when a dirge for the traitor will be heard.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps Imperialist Powers' Sanctions against Other Countries
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps Imperialist Powers' Sanctions against Other Countries
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The imperialist powers are openly slapping sanctions against other countries in a bid to realize their ambition to dominate them. With no rhetoric can they justify their vicious policy of sanctions.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a by-lined article.
					
					 The injustice of these sanctions lies in that they are disregarding international law and the norms governing the relations among countries and diametrically run counter to the universally recognized principle of independence and equality in international relations.
					
					 International law bans any country from forming an international alliance against other countries and does not allow it to infringe upon the interests of other sovereign state for meeting its selfish purpose.
					
					 It is needless to say that the imperialists' vicious sanctions against other countries are illegal criminal acts devoid of any basis of international law.
					
					 It is also unreasonable for the imperialists to try to legalize the "PSI," "Regional Marine Security Initiative", etc.
					
					 All the countries and nations should be let take part in the settlement of international issues with equal qualifications and rights.
					
					 The principle of independence and equality requires all countries to participate in the settlement of international issues with equal qualifications and rights.
					
					  Any violation of that principle would lead to the infringement upon sovereignty of countries in international arena and the formation of relations of domination and subjugation and those of inequality among countries.
					
					 The world people are now aspiring after independence, not domination and subjugation and after friendship and cooperation, not confrontation and dispute.
					
					 Gone are the days when specified forces could be hell-bent on arbitrary actions, putting sanctions upon other countries. 
					
					 Statements and resolutions exposing and denouncing the unreasonable sanctions of the imperialists are being adopted in different countries of the world and by international organizations.
					
					 The imperialists' wrong policy of sanctions is bound to fail as it is the leftover of the old era.

articles.title: Event for Peaceful Reunification Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Event for Peaceful Reunification Held in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- An event for peaceful reunification on the theme of "Let Us Join Hands and Defend June 15 Peace! Let Us Join Hands and Bring Earlier June 15 Reunification" was held in Seoul on June 12 on the occasion of the 11th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					 Present there were members of south Korean civic and public organizations including the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the "Reunification Plaza", the Solidarity for Progress, the Solidarity for Democratic Society and the Federation of Women's Organizations, personages of opposition parties, citizens and students. 
					
					 Speakers at the event called on the Korean people to advance the era of the June 15 reunification by concerted efforts of the Korean nation. 
					
					 They declared that they would put an end to the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen through elections to be held next year and thoroughly implement the South-North joint Declaration. 
					
					 An appeal of the south side committee was released. 
					
					 The appeal called on the south Korean people to turn out in the actions to prevent a war and defend peace in the same spirit as was displayed when they defeated the "Grand National Party" in the June 2 local election. 
					
					 It urged the authorities to ensure a national meeting for peaceful reunification to mark the 11th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration to be held in Kaesong on June 15. 
					
					 Participants watched a video dealing with astonishing achievements made by the Korean people in the movement for national reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself" since the publication of the joint declaration.

articles.title: Authorities' Deceptive Reshuffle Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Authorities' Deceptive Reshuffle Slammed in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea on June 9 issued a commentary slashing at traitor Lee Myung Bak's deceptive reshuffle of Chongwadae.
					 Noting that Lee is working to replace some personnel of Chongwadae, the commentary said: No one can find in this reshuffle any reflection on his wrongs whereby the people have been driven into the bottom of destitution and the south-north relations brought to the worst state.
					
					 The people demand dismissal of such guys as Kim Thae Hyo, presidential secretary for foreign strategy of the Chongwadae secretariat, and Chon Yong U, secretary for diplomacy and security of Chongwadae, it stressed.
					
					 It is impossible to expect the improved inter-Korean relations as long as these persons standing in the van of the anti-DPRK confrontation racket are allowed to stay in office, the commentary said.

articles.title: All-People Candlelight Action Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
All-People Candlelight Action Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Students Committee of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea on June 10 made public a statement calling for an all-people candlelight action to punish the Lee Myung Bak puppet group.
					 Many youth and students and people from all walks of life are turning out in the action to mark the 24th anniversary of the June Popular Resistance, the statement said.
					
					 The reality, in which the people are abandoning their life due to the widened gap between the rich and the poor, fully brings to light the deception of the Lee Myung Bak "government's" policy for common people, it said.
					
					 The authorities have driven the south-north relations into the uncontrollable catastrophe, resorting to the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen, it charged.
					
					 Stressing the need to conduct an all-people candlelight action to punish the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial regime in the sprit of the June Popular Resistance which recorded a page in the history of the movement for democracy, the statement called upon the people of all socials strata to tune out in the action.

articles.title: Conservative Media Hit for Distortion of Truth in S. Korea
articles.content:
Conservative Media Hit for Distortion of Truth in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea on June 9 issued a commentary to condemn the puppet conservative media for distorting the essence of the registration fee issue.
					 Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo, Dong-A Ilbo and other conservative media are building up the wrong public opinion that private universities or colleges are to blame for the registration fee issue, the commentary said.
					
					 Irregularities and corruption rampant at those schools are ascribable to the Lee Myung Bak "government's" failure to do its duty and, accordingly, the registration fee issue has not yet been settled, it pointed out.
					
					 But conservative media are distorting the essence of the issue in an attempt to arrest the strong protest of the people against the Lee "government" which has not fulfilled its commitments to halve registration fee, it charged.
					
					 The commentary urged the conservative media to clearly see the mindset of the people toward the registration fee issue.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak Hit for His Treachery
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak Hit for His Treachery
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the central organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) separately issued statements on June 11 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its hideous provocation.
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, in a statement condemned Lee for committing such treachery and unethical crime that make even the successive ruling quarters blush.
					
					 The present worst situation in the history of inter-Korean relations is attributable to the Lee group's bitterness towards compatriots and confrontation hysteria, its inveterate bad habit, the statement said.
					
					 It demanded the Lee group immediately punish the prime movers of the worst treachery, make an apology to the whole nation for it and step down at once.
					
					 Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, in a statement branded Lee's such political provocation as hurting the dignity of the leadership of the DPRK, in utter disregard of the nation and human morality as an unheard-of challenge to the whole Korean nation and the thrice-cursed hideous act of treachery, the statement noted.
					
					 It is the fixed will of the whole nation that it can never pardon the Lee group of traitors' crimes against the nation, reunification, democracy and humanity, it stressed.
					
					 The Korean youth and students in Japan will join the youth and students in the north and the south and abroad in taking the lead in the struggle to shatter the group of traitors' moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen with a nationwide offensive and bring earlier independent reunification, peace and prosperity in firm solidarity and alliance under the banner of "By our nation itself", declared the statement.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party Building Praised in Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party Building Praised in Egypt
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Wahid Al Uksouri, chairman of the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt, issued a statement on June 9 to mark the 47th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 From the very day of his start of work at the C.C, WPK Kim Jong Il has seen to it that the WPK always holds fast to the idea of President Kim Il Sung as the steadfast guiding idea and doctrine and built it into an invincible party which achieved steel-like unity and cohesion and took roots among the broad masses of people, the statement noted. 
					
					 Under the leadership of the WPK the Korean people have defended socialism by themselves in face of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces and won one victory after another in the revolution and construction, bringing about a turn in building a thriving nation, it stressed. 
					
					 The statement said that the WPK is now guiding to victory the Korean people's drive to creditably accomplish the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in E-book in Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in E-book in Ecuador 
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People released in e-book General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building" on June 3.
					 The work, published on October 10, 1992, deals with the historical lessons drawn from the building of ruling party under socialism. It also clarifies the fundamental principles for building a revolutionary party of Juche type and the idea on strengthening internationalist unity and solidarity among the revolutionary parties.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's China Visit Hailed in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's China Visit Hailed in Brazil
						
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Communist Party on June 6 posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il of the DPRK Visits China".
					 The article said that his China visit was of weighty significance under the present situation. 
					
					 The visit recorded a new charter in developing friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and China, it said, adding:
					
					 The Korean people are now pushing ahead with the building of a thriving nation, fully displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance to significantly commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: National Day Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
National Day Celebrated in Russia
						
 Moscow, June 13 (KCNA) -- The national day (Day of Russia) was celebrated in Russia on June 12.
					 A ceremony took place at Kremlin in Moscow to award the state commendations to officials who made distinguished contributions to development of the country.   
					
					 At the ceremony President Dmitri Medvedev said that the government would make every possible effort to develop the nation's science and culture and set up new special institutes at higher education organs. 
					
					 Then there was a banquet in celebration of the national day. 
					
					 Meanwhile concerts were held in different parts of Moscow including the Victory Park in Poklonaya Hill.
					
					 Mass demos and art performances took place in many cities including St-Peterburg, Nizhuni Novgorod and Vladivostok with attendance of thousands of people of different strata.

articles.title: Chinese Paper Introduces DPRK's Achievements
articles.content:
Chinese Paper Introduces DPRK's Achievements
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The June 10-16 issue of a Chinese paper carried an article of its correspondent in Pyongyang under the title of "DPRK is making the final charge toward a thriving nation".
					 The DPRK has entered the stage of final charge for opening the gate to a thriving nation, the article noted, saying:
					
					 As soon as he returned home after winding up his visit to China in late May, supreme leader Kim Jong Il inspected the Huichon Power Station under construction.
					
					 Economic construction is making headway at every factory and in the countryside.
					
					 The leader said that a thriving nation we mean is a great prosperous and powerful socialist country whose strength is enormous and where everything is thriving and the people lead a happy life with nothing to envy.
					
					 All the working people of the DPRK are now working hard full of passion, foreseeing the day when they are well off.
					
					 In articles subtitled "Key is to settle food problem", "'Knowledge-based economy' becomes a phrase in fashion" and "Whole country keeps pace with the Huichon speed" the paper cited detailed facts to introduce the ideological and moral traits and looks of the Korean people who have turned out in the drive to build a thriving nation.
					
					 The DPRK's resolution is as firm as rock and its people's zeal is very high, it stressed.

articles.title: Forest Fires, State of Emergency Declared in Russia
articles.content:
Forest Fires, State of Emergency Declared in Russia
						
 Moscow, June 13 (KCNA) -- The areas hit by forest fires which occurred in Russia due to sweltering weather, thunders and human factors trebled as compared with those last year.
					 According to the Russian Ministry of State of Emergency, there were 214 forest fires on June 10 alone and hardest hit were Khabarovsk Territory, Irkutsk Region, Tomsk Region, the Republic of Buryatiya, Yamalo-Nenets Autonomous Region and Hanti-Mansi Autonomous Region. 
					
					 More than 2,000 personnel and 200 technical apparatuses were involved in the extinguishment of forest fires in Krasnoyarsk Territory and a state of emergency was declared there.

articles.title: Japan's Illegal Whaling
articles.content:
Japan's Illegal Whaling
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Japan is continuing illegal whaling despite the strong opposition of the international community.
					 Kyodo News Service on June 11 said that Japan's whaling fleet left the ports of Yamaguchi and Hiroshima Prefectures for northwest Pacific Ocean to conduct scientific research.
					
					 The fleet plans to capture 260 whales till early next year but this is a wanton violation of the international norm which limits the haul of only several whales for scientific research.

articles.title: Iran Brands US as Chief Violator of NPT
articles.content:
Iran Brands US as Chief Violator of NPT
 Tehran, June 13 (KCNA) -- Iranian Foreign Minister Ali Akbar Salehi, speaking at an international meeting held in the capital on June 12, branded the United States as the chief violator of the NPT.
					 He accused the U.S. of using nuclear weapons in Japan during World War II.
					
					 Israel is the only hurdle in the way of realizing the denuclearization of the Mideast, he noted.

articles.title: Developing Countries' GDP to Grow
articles.content:
Developing Countries' GDP to Grow 
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The World Bank has projected that the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of developing nations is expected to go up 6.3 percent in the period between 2011 and 2013.
					The WB said this on June 7.

articles.title: Over 115 Million Children in Dangerous Jobs
articles.content:
Over 115 Million Children in Dangerous Jobs
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Many children, denied an opportunity to learn, are forced to do toilsome labor worldwide, raising a serious problem.
					  The International Labor Organization recently said that the number of world's child laborers at present is over 115 million.

articles.title: Earthquake Hits Kamchatka, Russia
articles.content:
Earthquake Hits Kamchatka, Russia
 Moscow, June 13 (KCNA) -- A 5.3-magnitude earthquake jolted eastern coastal area of Kamchatka, Russia on June 12.
					 The epicenter was the waters of the Pacific 160 km northwest of Bering Island.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de partido italiano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de partido italiano
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibió presente que le dedicara el Partido Popular Izquierdista de Comunistas de Italia. 
					El jefe del Departamento Internacional de esta organización política italiana, Alfonso Galdi, de visita en Corea, lo entregó el día 15 a Kim Yong Il, miembro suplente del Buró Político y secretario del Comité Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Llamamiento por 11º aniversario de Declaración Conjunta
articles.content:
Llamamiento por 11º aniversario de Declaración Conjunta
						
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ATCC) -- Los comités del Norte, el Sur y de ultramar para la ejecución de la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio, aprobada entre ambas partes coreanas, publicaron este miércoles, con motivo del 11 aniversario de este documento, un llamamiento que exige a todos propiciar la nueva coyuntura de la reconciliación y la unidad de la nación, la paz y la reunificación marchando juntos con el espíritu latente en ese documento íntercoreano.
					  La aprobación de la Declaración Conjunta en junio de 2000 devino un gran acontecimiento que trajo la transición de la historia de división nacional caracterizada por la desconfianza y enfrentamiento a la de reconciliación, unidad, paz y reunificación, comienza el texto y prosigue:
					
					  Lamentablemente, hoy en día, persiste el clima conflictivo y bélico en las relaciones N-S quedando cerradas las vías de viaje recíproco, contacto, diálogo y actos por la reunificación.
					
					  Esto es el resultado de la negativa a la mencionada declaración y del fomento de enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					  En particular, resultó frustrado el acto conjunto nacional en homenaje al 11º aniversario de publicación de la Declaración Conjunta programado en Kaesong, que acordaron y vinieron preparando las entidades civiles del Norte, el Sur y de ultramar. Esto significa la negación abierta a la concordia nacional, la paz y la reunificación.
					
					  Se registrará en la historia el aborto de ese acto, resultado del divisionismo nacional, que obstruye la unidad nacional, la cooperación y el intercambio entre los connacionales y persigue el enfrentamiento. Los que causaron la cancelación del acto tendrán que pagarlo caro tarde o temprano.
					
					  Que todos los compatriotas se unan en un solo bloque para implementar la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio. Esto es el compromiso y el juramento que toma ante la nación coreana el Comité Conjunto Nacional para la ejecución de la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					  La única salida, que nos permite superar la situación actual al borde de conflicto armado, está en poner en práctica dicho documento.
					
					  El Comité Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio se pondrá al frente de las campañas para promover la reconciliación y la unidad de la nación y alcanzar la paz y la reunificación independiente.
					
					  Son temporales los graves obstáculos que frenan la ejecución de la Declaración Conjunta. Nadie puede detener jamás la corriente torrencial de la época del 15 de Junio.

articles.title: Declaraciones conjuntas son bandera de la defensa de la paz
articles.content:
Declaraciones conjuntas son bandera de la defensa de la paz 
						
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ATCC) -- Hace ahora 11 años, se publicó la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio en la Cumbre Norte-Sur de Corea, celebrada por primera vez en la historia de la división. 
					La histórica Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio, noble conquista común de la nación, y la Declaración del 4 de Octubre, programa de ejecución de la primera, sirven de bandera de la defensa de la paz, que ilumina el rumbo y los remedios para establecer el sistema de paz duradera en la Península Coreana y lograr la reunificación y la prosperidad de Corea. 
					
					El primer documento aclaró que el problema de reunificación del país debe ser resuelto de manera independiente por las fuerzas unidas de la nación coreana. 
					
					El otro documento reafirmó el espíritu de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", expuesto en la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio, y a base de ello, dilucidó que el Norte y el Sur deben cooperar estrechamente para poner fin a las relaciones de hostilidad militar, aliviar la tensión y preservar la paz en la Península Coreana. 
					
					En esa ocasión ambas partes coreanas llegaron al consenso en acabar con el actual sistema de armisticio y establecer el otro de paz duradera y acordaron cooperar estrechamente para ese efecto. 
					
					La Declaración del 4 de Octubre presenta el problema de convertir el Mar Oeste de Corea, zona delicada en lo militar, en la zona marítima de paz. 
					
					En ese caso, se solucionarán los problemas importantes para prevenir los conflictos militares entre el Norte y el Sur y establecer el sistema de paz duradera.
					
					Hoy día, todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar aspiran a la paz y la reunificación. 
					
					Las fuerzas, que persiguen la confrontación y la guerra en dicha península, no son nada más que las fuerzas extranjeras agresivas y las conservadoras surcoreanas que les obedecen a ciegas. 
					
					Si los coreanos se unen compactamente con el espíritu de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y ejecutan con sinceridad los proyectos para la preservación de la paz, indicados en las declaraciones conjuntas, se lograrán sin falta la paz y la seguridad de la Península Coreana.

articles.title: Comité norteño denuncia a la camarilla de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Comité norteño denuncia a la camarilla de Lee Myung Bak 
						
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ATCC) -- La banda de conservadores surcoreanos impidió la participación de la delegación surcoreana en los actos conjuntos nacionales, que los delegados de distintos estratos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar acordaron realizar en Kaesong con motivo del 11º aniversario de la publicación de la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio. 
					El Comité Norteño para la Ejecución de la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio, en su declaración fechada 15, calificó tales maniobras de la banda títere surcoreana de un desafío cruel a ese programa de reunificación y de un crimen imperdonable que contraviene a la aspiración de la nación a la paz y la reunificación. 
					
					Al impedir los actos conjuntos nacionales por el 15 de junio de este año, la camarilla de Lee Myung Bak reveló más fehacientemente su malsana intención de negar la Declaración Conjunta y perseguir el enfrentamiento y la guerra, acusa la nota y prosigue:
					
					La reunificación de la patria es el máximo anhelo de la nación. En este territorio coreano no hay otra tarea más apremiante que preservar la paz. 
					
					Ahora llegan al clímax la indignación de la población surcoreana y otros integrantes de la nación contra la banda títere que nada a contrapelo de la paz y la reunificación. 
					
					Toda la nación coreana nunca tolerará el crimen antinacional y anti-reunificación de la banda de traidores que viola la histórica Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio y reprime brutalmente el movimiento por la reunificación de la patria. 
					
					Por más que la camarilla traidora actúe con frenesí, el Comité Norteño para la Ejecución de la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio acelerará, junto con los habitantes surcoreanos y los demás compatriotas en ultramar, la marcha pannacional por la reunificación, enarbolando la bandera de la Declaración Conjunta Norte-Sur.

articles.title: Periódicos conmemoran publicación de declaración Conjunta N-S
articles.content:
Periódicos conmemoran publicación de declaración Conjunta N-S
						
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ATCC) -- Los periódicos capitalinos difundieron en sus ediciones de este miércoles los editoriales dedicados al 11º aniversario de la publicación de la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					Hace 11 años se realizó por primera vez en la historia de la división nacional el encuentro de los máximos dirigentes del Norte y el Sur en la cual que se aprobó la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio, gran programa de toda la nación coreana por la reunificación, comienza el diario Rodong Sinmun y continúa:
					
					La aprobación de este documento y el vigoroso avance de la época por la reunificación independiente son el resultado de la destacada y probada guía del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El gran propósito y la enérgica guía del Dirigente trajeron en octubre de 2007 los nuevos eventos como la otra cumbre Norte-Sur y la aprobación de la Declaración del 4 de Octubre, programa de implementación de la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de junio. 
					
					Pero, en la actualidad la lucha de la nación coreana por lograr la reunificación de la patria bajo la bandera de la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de junio y la Declaración del 4 de Octubre se enfrenta con las graves dificultades.
					
					Las fuerzas en el poder actual del Sur de Corea se entregan frenéticamente a las maquinaciones conflictivas en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras oponiéndose obstinadamente a estas declaraciones N-S.
					
					Acabar con estas maniobras es el deber más apremiante en la lucha de la nación coreana.
					
					Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben librar con las fuerzas unidas la energética ofensiva general para castigar a la camarilla de Lee Myung Bak quien impide la ejecución de las declaraciones arriba mencionadas y agrava la confrontación fratricida.
					
					Mientras hay la política de Songun del Dirigente, patriota sin igual y gran político reconocido por el mundo, y las fuerzas poderosas de la nación coreana unida firmemente bajo la bandera de dichas declaraciones, se lograrán ciertamente la reunificación independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.
					
					El periódico Minju Joson subraya que todos los coreanos del Norte, Sur y en ultramar bajo la guía del Dirigente, deberán librar la enérgica lucha bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y cumplir con brillantez la causa histórica de la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de junio.
